title: Client and In game lagging
body: I need some help and I don't think Riot is going to help. In the client and IN game, it has become very laggy like 4 second delay.  It hasn't done it before until yesterday. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body:
Yikes, that sounds like some major lag, possibly packet loss as well if you see things stuttering around or completely ignoring your commands at times. Do me a favor and run through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as basic steps. 

If that doesn't seem to help yet also run a traceroute using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1. I'll be able to get an idea of what your connection looks like from that trace!
